Packages that use LexicalItem
is.merkor.core   
is.merkor.core.database.daos Contains direct access objects (DAOs) for the MerkOr relational database using Hibernate. 
is.merkor.core.database.data Contains classes representing persistent objects mapping to the MerkOr relational database using Hibernate. 
is.merkor.core.database.services Contains service classes communicating with the DAOs for the MerkOr relational database using Hibernate.
